data.text: Ndomtogola Mkulu Nguluwi mihela jeng'ha,
Heni ndowa na lutogo hali Mkulu Nguluwi,
Mumtogole Mkulu Nguluwi hamwe na heni,
Nandimlanda Mkulu Nguluwi naye nakanyidichila,
Wala walingumlola, wowichigwa lumuli,
Yalingubunzwa nakamlilila Mkulu Nguluwi, naye nakamhulika,
Mhilisi wa Mkulu Nguluwi kanguwamilaga banzi zeng'ha na kuwalohola,
Mjeze mone Mkulu Nguluwi vyoyawele yanojile.
Mumdumbe Mkulu Nguluwi hemwe welile wa heye,
Mbaka misimba jangwisilwa na kona nzala,
Muye hemwe wasongolo mnyhulichize,
Whaani yalingunojezwa na ukomu,
Lelo, uleche kulonga gehile,
Wiwiche kutali na wihe, udite ganojile,
Meho ga Mkulu Nguluwi ganguwalolaga watanganiche,
ila Mkulu Nguluwi kanguwaga yochitwanza na walingudita wihe,
Watanganiche howomlilila Mkulu Nguluwi, heye kanguwahulika,
Mkulu Nguluwi ka habehi na hewo watweguche nhumbula,
Magazo ga yatanganiche ndo menji,
Kangujamila mizeje ja heye jeng'ha,
Wihe wanguwegalilaga wehile kubagama,
Mkulu Nguluwi kanguloholaga ukomu wa vitumagwa wa heye,
